trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，表示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> 的周框 (Bounding Rectangle)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 的螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "Window".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 的文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the name is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> 的字串，如果名稱為 <see langword="null" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 屬性可以視為的使用者可以用來說明所參考的控制項的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請務必中所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。
